connectionProperties.propertyShortDesc: Please make sure that this value really corresponds to the type selected above.

connectionProperties.displayName: Enable two way SSL for outbound connections (Optional)
connectionProperties.propertyDescription: Both the client and the server pass certificates to each other to establish an SSL link, when two-way SSL is enabled. Both sides now know the identity of the other from their respective certificates.
connectionProperties.propertyShortDesc: Select "Yes" if both the client and server should authenticate each other.

connectionProperties.propertyDescription: Both the client and the server pass certificates to each other to establish an SSL link, when two-way SSL is enabled. Name of the identity certificate alias to use for that communication. This value should match the alias that was provided to import identity to ICS.
connectionProperties.propertyShortDesc: Name of alias to use for establishing identity during two way SSL communication
